attr.title: Godstone
attr.desc: Wield magic and weaponry in this roguelike dungeoncrawler, forge powerful builds and explore a story that evolves based on your actions. The end goal: Claim the Godstone before those who would use it to destroy your kind.
attr.inst: Purchase Godstone on Steam. Copy all files to ports/godstone/assets.
attr.inst_md:
- Purchase Godstone on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1715030/Godstone/).
- Install testing zip.
-  Copy all files to ports/godstone/assets
- Run Godstone.
